name: Erica Luttrell
info:
• 简体中文名: 艾丽卡·鲁特雷尔
  • 别名: Erica Shukrani Luttrell
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1982-03-20
detail: Erica Luttrell was born on March 20, 1982 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada as Erica Shukrani Luttrell. She is an actress, known for Westworld (2016), Salvation (2017) and Magnum P.I. (2018).
